howToGetIt: HFDH welcomes children ages three months to five years. Our program is offered year-round, with the school year beginning in mid-August. Enrollment continues throughout the year as openings occur. There is no fee to apply. Applications can be submitted year-round. You may submit your application through our website, postal mail, in person, through fax, or by email to intake@holyfamilydayhome.org. Depending on your family-size and income, you may qualify for a childcare voucher, or be placed on an eligibility list to await services. Holy Family Day Home cannot directly offer your family services until Children’s Council or Wu Yee has approved your family for a care subsidy. Please contact Children’s Council or Wu Yee directly for any questions or inquiries about Early Learning SF.
